summary: Integrates the Android IP Webcam application into Home Assistant, exposing the device as a camera entity with MJPEG streaming and still image support, along with optional motion detection, audio/video connection sensors, and control switches, while managing configuration, periodic data retrieval, and entity state updates.
business_intent: Allow users to turn an Android phone running the IP Webcam app into a network camera for home automation, surveillance, and monitoring within Home Assistant.
